column2: Before we start, would you like to learn more about the Inner Critic?
column3: Please describe a situation where your inner critic is especially hard on you
column4: What does your inner critic say in that situation?
column6: Please try to rewrite this thought as coming from your inner coach instead
column7: Next time that you are in this situation, what is one thing you can do to listen to your inner coach instead?
column8: How did this exercise make you feel?

column3: When people don't agree with something I have said. I usually end up changing my thoughts to fit in with theres
column5: I want you have more confidence in yourself
column6: Just because someone doesn't agree with you it doesn't mean what you have said is wrong and what they have said is right
column7: Say nothing more about it or push my thought if I'm feeling up to it

column3: Thinking of past mistakes that have reshaped my life
column5: I want you to be more careful in the future
column6: You made a mistake but it’s not the end of the world
column7: Remembering that it’s not the end of the world
